channel.title: public employment on MREF
channel.description: Recent content in public employment on MREF

item.title: Unemployment
item.description: This course presents a matching model of unemployment and uses it to study unemployment fluctuations, efficient unemployment, and labor market policies.

item.title: A Theory of Countercyclical Government Multiplier
item.description: This paper develops a New Keynesian model in which the government multiplier doubles when unemployment rises from 5% to 8%. Published in AEJ Macro, 2014.
